import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './slidebar.css'; import imagePath from '../constants/imagePath'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; interface SlidebarProps { isSidebarOpen: boolean; setHeaderLabel: React.Dispatch>; } const Slidebar = ({isSidebarOpen,setHeaderLabel}:SlidebarProps) => { const navigate =useNavigate(); const [openMenu, setOpenMenu] = useState(''); const toggleSubMenu = (menu: string) => { setOpenMenu(prevMenu => (prevMenu === menu ? '' : menu)); // Toggle the submenu open/closed }; return ( <>
{isSidebarOpen ? : }
